about_the_game:
In DumbSquad, you are a Dumbkun or Dumbchan, an evolved version of the extinct humans, taking the role of a “Hunter” to hunt down dangerous monsters that lurk around the post-apocalyptic world you called home.

The Way of A Hunter
As you slay those beasts, received materials from them, and collect some useful scraps littered around the map, you can craft stronger and more powerful weapons, armor, and gears to prepare yourself to hunt more dangerous and life-threatening mutants.
Exhausted from a long hunt? Take a break at the live lobby (like hanging out at the cafeteria, participating a quick arena quest and much more)!

Hunt Together or Go Solo
Luckily, you are not alone! Form your hunting “squad” with other hunters, either with your friends or strangers you can hire at the live lobby. Together, you can take down the beast more efficiently!
As General Muta once said, “Either we all fight together or we all die together!”
But if you are more of a lone wolf, you are free to do so too!

Surviving The New World
Brace yourself for a variety of mutant monsters in this dangerous new world! From mindless killing machines to intelligent silent killers, each will test your skills as a hunter.
But don’t fret! There are a variety of weapons to choose from in your arsenal! And each of them has a different active and passive skill that would help on your hunt!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.6 LTS
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 580 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard HD audio device

name: DumbSquad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard HD audio device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080/RTX 3060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard HD audio device
